NewsArticle.Title: Nexon Chat on Stratics This Thursday!
NewsArticle.Content:
Stratics will be presenting the second Dark Ages: Medenia chat on Stratics IRC with the Dark Ages Team. The topic for this discussion will be Dark Ages: Medenia, The new continent and more. The chat will be on February 20th at 7:00 PM EST. You can connect to channel #daHOC on Stratics IRC servers by using mIRC, pirch, Ircle, or one of your favorite linux chat clients and connect to irc.stratics.com port 6667 or to a server closest to you:

irc.frws.com port 6667 USA - Colorado
irc.glowfish.de port 6667 EU - Germany
irc2.frws.com port 6667 USA - Colorado
